item.title: Products
item.author: info@staysail.tech (Staysail Systems, Inc.)
item.description: Products Staysail Systems, Inc. offers the following products: wolfSSL plugin support for NNG. A free version is available on GitHub under GPLv3.0, but we also provide a commercially licensed version. This enables commercial applications and FIPS 140-2 validated solutions, and TLS 1.3 to be created with NNG. matrixSSL plugin support for NNG. (Forthcoming.) This plugin will provide support for solutions using matrix SSL with NNG.
